description: This file configures the Angular application by providing routing, zone change detection, and client hydration settings.

methods.name: provideZoneChangeDetection
methods.description: Provides zone change detection with event coalescing enabled.

methods.name: provideRouter
methods.description: Sets up routing with the specified routes.

methods.name: provideClientHydration
methods.description: Enables client-side hydration with event replay.

methods.name: withEventReplay
methods.description: Configures event replay behavior for hydration.
